text.p: Intellicall Inc said Thursday that it has named John McDonald, president and chief operating officer.
John Carradine, vice president of finance and controller, has been appointed chief financial officer for the company.
The position of president had been filled by William Hunt, who continues to serve as chairman of the board and chief executive officer.
Hunt has relinquished the title of president and has created the new position of chief operating officer.
McDonald, who has been senior vice-president of sales and marketing, assumes full operating responsibility for the company and reports to Hunt.
Carradine, who has most recently been vice president of finance and controller of Intellicall, replaces Michael Barnes, who is retiring.
